text: Xylopia aromatica is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family and the accepted name of Xylopia xylopioides. It is a tree native to Cerrado grassland vegetation, particularly in the states of Goiás and Minas Gerais, in eastern Brazil. ==References== ==External links== aromatica Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of the Cerrado Category:Flora of Goiás Category:Flora of Minas Gerais
title: Xylopia aromatica
